subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ryan Zimmerman’s hitting streak ended at 30 games, but Shairon Martis threw seven sharp innings and the Washington Nationals won, 6-3, over the San Francisco Giants.
snippet: Ryan Zimmerman’s hitting streak ended at 30 games, but Shairon Martis threw seven sharp innings and the Washington Nationals won, 6-3, over the San Francisco Giants.
